summary: The module provides a collection of helper functions that compare individual dataset attributes (such as author, title, license, tags, etc.) and higherâ€‘level routines that evaluate overall metadata and resource differences between two dataset versions, returning a structured list of change descriptions for activity logging.
business_intent: Enable CKAN to record and expose modifications to dataset metadata and resources, supporting audit trails, notifications, and activity streams that inform users about what has changed in a dataset over time.
